definitions.body: [[שָׁכַב]] (Lag:BN 63)

definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: lie down (NH = BH; [[שכב]] Sir 47:23 (in death), [[משכב]] bed Sir 40:5, Sir 47:20 d, = death bed Sir 46:19; Ph. [[שכב]], [[משכב]] (v. ´[[מ]]:
infr.), Lzb:375; Eth. sakaba: lie, Aram [[שְׁכַב]], 4kab; Nab. [[משכבא]] couch; Ar. sakaba only pour out (water, tears), be poured out (cf.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: infr., and Lag:BN 63));—
lie down (sometimes opp. [[קוּם]], [[הֵקִיץ]]):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ju Jdg 5:27 (prostrated by blow, + [[כָּרַע]], [[נׇפַל]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: to sleep, Ge 19:4 (J), Ge 28:11 (E), 1Sa 3:5, De 7:7, Pr 6:22 + oft.; read [[וַיִּשְׁכַּב]] also (for [[וַיַּשְׁכֵּם]]) 1Sa 9:26 LXX Th We Dr and mod.; ´[[שׁ]]: + [[יׇשֵׁן]] sleep 1Ki 19:5, Ps 3:6, Ps 4:8, cf. Pr 3:24, Pr 3:24, + [[נִרְדָּם]] Jon 1:5; = be lying 1Sa 3:2, 1Sa 3:3, 1Sa 26:5 (all [[בְּ]] loc.), v:1Sa 26:7, 1Sa 4:5 (acc. cogn. noon-repose), 2Sa 13:8, cf. [[שׁׂכֵב בְּלֶב־יׇם]] Pr 23:34, of two lying (together, for warmth) Ec 4:11; + be sleeping 1Sa 26:7 = keep lying, c. [[עַד]] Ju Jdg 16:3, 1Sa 3:15, Ru 3:13, Pr 6:9; emphasis on resting, Le 26:6 (H), Job 11:18; token of mourning, [[וְשָׁכַב אָָרְחָה]] ([[וְלָן]]) 2Sa 12:16, cf. 2Sa 13:21, [[בַּשָּׂק]] ´[[שׁ]]: 1Ki 21:27, [[בֵּין שְׁפַתָָּיִם]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ps 68:14 (of indolence?); fig. of prostration by disease Ps 41:9; among foes Ps 57:5; of humiliation Je 3:25; c. [[עַל]] rei: land Ge 28:13 (J), usu. bed 2Sa 13:5, 1Ki 21:4, Le 15:4, Le 15:24, Le 15:26, cf. v:Le 15:20, for midday repose 2Sa 4:7.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: lie on ([[עַל]]) one’s side Ez Eze 4:4, Eze 4:4, Eze 4:6, Eze 4:9 (symbol.).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: lie, [[עַל]] pers. 1Ki 3:19 (fatally), 2Ki 4:34 (to revive).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: lie [[בְּחֵיק]], of lamb (i.e. be cherished) 2Sa 12:3, of woman Mic 7:5 (intimacy), 1Ki 1:2 (vital warmth); lie down for copulation Ge 19:33, Ge 19:35 (of woman, v.
infr.; both opp. [[קוּם]]).
= lodge (for night), ([[שָׁ֫מָּה]]) ´[[שׁ]]: Jos 2:1 (E), 2Ki 4:11, cf. 2Ki 9:16 (yet perhaps = lie ill), Le 14:47 ([[בְּ]] loc.).

of sexual relations, lie with: subj. man, c. [[עִם]] Ge 30:15, Ge 30:16, Ge 39:7, Ge 39:12, Ge 39:14 (J), Ex 22:13 (E), De 22:22 + 8 t. Dt., 2Sa 11:4, 2Sa 11:11, 2Sa 12:11, 2Sa 12:24, Le 15:33; c. [[אֶת]] fem. with (MT [[אׂתָהּ]], etc., orig. [[אִתָּהּ]], etc., v. Dr:2Sa 13:14 and II. [[אֵת]], p. 85:a supra), Ge 26:10, Ge 34:2, Ge 34:7, Ge 35:22 (all J), 1Sa 2:22 (om. LXX and mod.), 2Sa 13:14, Ez Eze 23:8 (fig.), Le 15:24 ([[שָׁכׂב יִשְׁכַּב]]), Nu 5:19, also (c. acc. cogn. [[שִׁכְבַת־זֶרַע]]) v:Nu 5:13, Le 15:18, Le 19:20; c. acc. (sf.) fem. De 28:30 Kt (v. [[[שָׁגֵל]]]); c. [[אֵחֶל]] fem. Ge 39:10 (J); c. [[אֵת]] vir. (sodomy), Le 18:22, Le 20:13 (both H; c. acc. cogn. [[מִשְׁכְּבֵי אִשָּׁה]]); c. [[עִם־בְּהֵמָה]] De 27:21, Le 22:18 (H); subj. woman, c. [[עִם]] vir. Ge 19:32, Ge 19:34, Ge 19:35 (J) 2Sa 13:11; [[אֵת]] vir. Ge 19:33, Ge 19:34 (cf.

definitions.title: 4. a.
definitions.body: lie down in death, Is 14:8, Is 43:17 (opp. [[קוּם]]), Ez Eze 31:18, Eze 32:27, Eze 32:28, Eze 32:29, Eze 32:30, Job 14:12 (opp. [[קוּם]], [[הֵקִיץ]]), [[וְאֶשְׁקוֹט]] ´[[שׁ]]: Job 3:12; be lying (dead) Is 51:20, La 2:21.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: esp. in phr. [[עִם אֲבוֹתָיו]] ´[[שׁ]]: lie down with his fathers, of kings 1Ki 1:21, 1Ki 2:10 + 35 t. K Ch, cf. Ge 47:30 (J) De 31:16, and (c. [[אֵת]]) 2Sa 7:12
fig. = relax: Job 30:17 my gnawing pains do not sleep; = have rest, [[לִבּוֹ]] ´[[לאׁ שׁ]]: Ec 2:23. †

definitions.title: Niph. Pu.
definitions.body: = be lain with (sexually; subj. woman), only as Qr for Kt [[[שָׁגֵל]]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: lay, Pf. 3 fs. [[הִשְׁכִּיבָה]] c. acc. puer. + [[בְּחֵיק]] 1Ki 3:20, so Impf. 3 fs. sf. [[וַתַּשְׁכִּיבֵהוּ]] v:1Ki 3:20, cf. ([[עַל־מִטָּה]]) 1Ki 17:19, 2Ki 4:21; Inf. abs. [[הַשְׁכֵּב אוֹתָם אַ֫רְחָה]] 2Sa 8:2 making them lie down on ground; Impf. also lay [[בַּמִּשְׁכָּב]] 2Ch 16:14 (of burial); [[נִבְלֵי שָׁמַיִם מִי יַשְׁכִּיב]] Job 38:37 i.e. tip them so that contents may flow out (cf. Ar. sakaba supra). †

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מֻשְׁכָּב]] 2Ki 4:32 laid [[עַל־מִטָּה]]; Pf. consec. [[וְהֻשְׁכַּב]] Ez Eze 32:32 shall be laid (in death), c. [[בְּתוֹח]] et [[אֵת]] pers. (with); so Imv. ms. [[הָשְׁכְּבָה]] v:Eze 32:19 (c. [[אֵת]] pers. only).
